ingredients.text: 2 rice cooker cups short grain (11.5 ounces or 326 grams)

403.name: Perfect White Rice in a Rice Cooker

ingredients.text: 1/4 cup Sake Or Mirin (a Japanese Rice Wine)
3 cups Japanese short-grain rice, rinsed several times

408.name: How To Make Rice in a Rice Cooker recipes

ingredients.text: 1 cup short-, medium-, or long-grain white rice
2 cup rice milk (this makes the recipe dairy-free!)
1/2 cup mochi sweet rice (or just less. You need 20 teaspoons of rice)
1/8 tsp Saigon cinnamon (if your cinnamon is not that strong, add a bit more)
100.0g basmati rice , long grain rice or brown rice
2.0 tbsp toasted pumpkin seeds or sunflower seeds
½ cucumber , deseeded and finely chopped
1 small red pepper , deseeded and finely chopped
2 teaspoons of chicken fat or olive oil
1/2 cup chopped onion - green onion (scallions) or yellow onion
Up to 4 cups of stock (amount depends on the type of rice you are using), either chicken stock or vegetable stock for vegetarian option, or a mix of water and stock*
2 teaspoons of Vegesal (or other seasoned salt)
1 pound sushi quality tuna, salmon, yellowtail, snapper
4 1/2 cups basmati rice or other long-grain white rice
2 cup raw rice - long grain, jasmine or short grain rice, 380 g
½ cup forbidden rice or black glutinous rice
⅓ cup short grain arborio rice
¼ cup plus 2 tablespoons cream of coconut (such as coco lopez)
¼ cup plus 2 tablespoons cream of coconut (such as coco lopez)
1 passion fruit, seeds and pulp removed
1/4 cup sake-mash vinegar (or white wine vinegar)
Nuts and raw sugar for sprinkling
Nuts and raw sugar for sprinkling
3 cups jasmine rice or any other long-grain rice, washed
2 1/2 cups water, or as necessary (see “game plan” above)
6 cups boiling water, plus extra for rinsing and soaking the rice, mushrooms and shrimp
1 (14.5 ounce) can of chicken broth, divided
1 to 2 tablespoons light soy sauce, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon white pepper, or to taste
2 cups instant rice (such as Minute Rice)
2 cups cooked wild rice (or “instant” wild rice, wild rice blend, etc)
½ tbs. olive oil + salt + pepper
300.0g basmati rice and wild rice (tilda is a good choice)
300.0g basmati rice and wild rice (tilda is a good choice)
1 cup (8 fl. oz./250 ml) unseasoned rice vinegar
3 cups (21 oz./655 g) short-grain white rice (“sushi rice”)
2 tablespoons grated and peeled fresh ginger

436.name: Purple Tai Rice Cooker Sticky Rice

ingredients.text: 1 1/2 cups jasmine rice or basmati rice, well rinsed
1/4-1/3 cup 1-inch pieces broken thin spaghetti (a small handful), regular or whole grain
¾ cup uncooked regular long-grain white rice
2 mangoes, peeled and cut into 3-inch sticks
3/4 cup short-grain white rice (if unable to locate, try medium-grain white rice in the spanish foods section of store)
3/4 cup golden seedless raisins pre-soaked in warm water
2 cups cooked Arborio rice or other short-grain rice
1 cup short, medium, or long-grain brown rice
2 tablespoons brown rice or light yellow miso
2-4 tbsp coconut cream (you can freeze the rest)
300.0g sticky rice (a glutinous rice, sometimes sold as sushi rice)
1 cup black rice (such as Lotus Foods Forbidden Rice)
1 2" piece peeled ginger, sliced into 4 coins
1/2 tsp kosher salt, plus more to taste

451.name: Citrus-Bay Rice Pudding with Rice Crisps

ingredients.text: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 cup parboiled rice (this kind of rice is very forgiving and doesn't get sticky - i use zatarains but any kind is fine)
Chicken stock to cover the rice - at least 2 cups
A pinch pf cayenne (or more depending on your need for heat)
1½ c. wild rice or wild rice blend
2 teaspoons loose Sencha or Bancha tea, or the tea from 2 green-tea bags
1/2 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
2 c. Cooked brown or white rice
¾ c. regular long-grain white rice
1 c. each uncooked wild rice and orzo (rice-shaped pasta)
1 c. each uncooked wild rice and orzo (rice-shaped pasta)
½ c. thawed frozen green peas
½ tsp. each salt and pepper
½ tsp. each salt and pepper
½ lb. large shrimp (about 8), peeled, deveined, and quartered
6 cups cooked rice, at room temperature
5 eggs, beaten with ¼ tsp. kosher salt
¾ cup finely chopped country ham
1 vanilla bean, split and seeds scraped
pinch of ground cinnamon or freshly grated nutmeg
1 tbsp butter , plus more for the dish
¼ cup short-grain rice for risotto, such as Arborio
3 cups day-old cooked rice, at room temperature
1 (6-ounce) package long grain and wild rice
2 tablespoons grated and peeled fresh ginger
1 pouch UNCLE BENS® READY RICE® Original Long Grain Rice
.5 cup(s) frozen shelled edamame or peas
1 large takeout order chinese roast pork, cut in strips
1 small takeout order chinese white rice
1 cup raw white basmati rice (found in health food stores)
½ tsp. dried thyme or 2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves
* 1/4 cup fresh lemon juice i use meyer lemon when i can
1 package shiitake mushrooms (or sliced mixed wild mushrooms)
